thread.section_title: DHgate 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 DHgate 的点评意见 | www.dhgate.com
thread.title: Autumn @ Bodhi Aesthetics & Wellness
thread.title_full: DHgate 的点评人 Autumn @ Bodhi Aesthetics & Wellness

author: Autumn @ Bodhi Aesthetics & Wellness
title: Autumn @ Bodhi Aesthetics & Wellness
text: I've ordered multiple things from this site and always been satisfied. Packages are delivered intact (albeit, thoroughly covered in packing tape to protect the boxes...lol). Items are always what they claim and sellers are generally pretty helpful with special requests.
